import { MoreVert } from "@mui/icons-material"; import "./post.css"; import { Users } from "../DummyData"; export default function Post({ post }) { console.log(post); return (
u.id === post.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" className="postProfileImg" /> {Users.filter((u) => u.id === post.userId)[0].username} {post.date} min ago
{post?.desc}
{post.like} people like it
{post.comment} comments
); }
